job_description:
• Currently pursuing a degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
• Ensure DRAM silicon performance meets manufacturing and design requirements.
• Analytical approach with attention to detail and problem-solving skills.
• Experience with DRAM architecture or semiconductor validation workflows.
• Prior internship or project experience in memory design or validation.
• Excellent communication and documentation skills.
• Less than 2 years Principal Engineer - HIG HBM - PE Design ValidationSingapore, SingaporePosted 2 months ago.
• Familiarity with characterization techniques and HMV trim solutions.
